An apartment with one bedroom and a living room is called a two room apartment. An apartment with two bedrooms and a living room is a three room apartment, etc. In every apartment there is a bathroom with bath or shower present. Often there is a separate toilet (otherwise there is one the bathroom). Every apartment has a kitchenette with an electrical cooker, a fridge and in some cases a dishwasher. The apartments usually have a balcony.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Facilities
When to apply for the Ski Guarantee?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
You should apply 5 days before your departure date and no later than 4 days before your departure/ arrival date. Requests that have been filled out 6 days before departure and within 3 days before departure will not be taken into consideration.

The Ski Guarantee will apply if:
  • The highest point of your destination is at least 2000m
  • If less than 1/3 of the lifts are open 4 days before your departure

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Changes
CAN I CHANGE THE DESTINATION?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
Destinations can be changed if it is a SELF DRIVE holiday.
The destination can only be changed if the day on which you call is at least 30 days before departure.

For flights packages it is not possible to change the booking.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: CAN I PAY WITH A CREDIT CARD?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
It is possible to pay for your holiday with your credit card. This can be done when you make your online booking or via the My Sunweb portal, once you have received your invoice. It is also possible to do a credit card payment over the phone.
NOTE: We can process Mastercard and VISA credit cards. A 2% surcharge will be added for the credit card payment.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: CAN I BOOK FROM ABROAD?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
Even if you live abroad you can book online with us. We refer you to Sunweb.com for an overview of our websites available abroad. If your choice is not listed here we have a few tips for you if you want to make an online booking: You cannot enter a foreign postal code or international phone numbers on an online booking. Please fill in your own telephone numbers without the international access codes. At the end of the booking form please include, in the "Remarks", the correct postcode and the correct phone numbers. Unfortunately we cannot issue travel insurance for people not living in the UK. You can use the following details to make a payment to us from abroad:

Bank: Lloyds TSB
Account number: 21109768
Bank Sort Code: 306541
BIC/SWIFT code: LLOYDGB21682
IBAN code: GB09 LOYD 3065 4121 1097 68

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Payment
CAN I BOOK A HOLIDAY FOR 1 PERSON?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: On the website we have holiday offers for 1 person. Go to the menu "Search and book" for this. Then state on the left side of the website that the group consists of 1 person. In the menu to the left you can state your other preferences like the destination, holiday duration and facilities. Once you have chosen your preferred accommodation then click through to the tab 'prices and promotions'. Here you will find information about the availability of 1 person rooms.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Ski/snowboard
CAN I PAY BY DEBIT CARD?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
It is possible to pay for your holiday with your debit card. This can be done when you make you booking online or via the My Sunweb portal, once you have received your invoice. It is also possible to pay with your debit card over the phone.
NOTE: There are no extra charges when you pay with a debit card.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: CAN I ADD A PERSON TO MY BOOKING?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
It is possible to add a person to a booking if: 
  • The maximum occupancy in the room / apartment is not exceeded
  • It is a self- drive holiday

If you have booked a flights package, please contact us.
Note: Only the lead booker can make changes to the booking by phone or by email.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: When do I get a response to my request?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: Sunweb will contact you on the Wednesday before departure to discuss the plan of action.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: What does a mezzanine or a cabin cosist of?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: A number of studios and apartments come equipped with a mezzanine, a semi-detached sleeping area. A cabin is a separate sleeping area without a window that can usually be sealed with a sliding door.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Extra facilities / services
Are towels and linen included in the hotel?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: If you are staying in a hotel than your bed linen and bath towels are included in the total costs. You usually use the same bed linen for one week; bath towels are usually changed two or three times per week. For exact details please refer to the description of the hotel.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Important conditions
Prices
When is the early booking discount valid?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: You can expect an attractive early booking discount at many accommodations! This can be recognized by the yellow coloured prices in the price overview of the accommodation. The discount is already calculated into this price. The final date of the early booking discount differs per accommodation. This varies between dates in January until April. If you want to know when an early booking discount is valid for a particular accommodation then you can contact us via email: info@sunweb.co.uk.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Where can I find the costs for ski hire?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
You can find this information at the destination of your choice:

  • Click on the destinations on the homepage;
  • Make a choice of accommodation;
  • Click on the tab 'lift pass / Skis & Classes';
  • and then on 'Equipment rental’.

With all flight bookings to France we are currently offering FREE Bronze ski material hire for 7 days. It is possible to also upgrade this gear. You can do this in Step 2 of the booking steps.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Do children and elderly people get a discount on a lift pass?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
Most lift passes include a discount for children and elderly. You can find this discount with your accommodation:

  • Choose your accommodation
  • click on the tab ''Lift passes/ Skis & Classes' '
  • and then on 'lift pass ‘ for more information.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Is the departure date the same as the day of arrival?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: Yes, in the case of pricate transportation our website states the departure date as the day of arrival.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: What if I arrive late?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: If you are planning on checking in late on your arrival day, it is almost always possible to get into your hotel or apartment. However, it is very important that this is arranged in advance. You will receive your travel documents approximately 8 days before your departure, and this will include instructions on how to arrange your late arrival and collection of the key.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Can I use a promotion code if I have already made a booking?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: If the promotion is still valid we can process the discount into your booking. You can state your booking number and promotion code via info@sunweb.co.uk. Your discount will then be processed after receiving your message.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Do I state my maiden name or my married name with the booking?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
It is important that the first and the last name on the tickets are exactly the same as the details on the passport.

Please be extremely careful when entering the names and birth dates of your group. easyjet charges for name changes in bookings. You are responsible for any additional costs that may incur due to a name change. Please check the terms and conditions of easyJet to see what the exact costs are for this.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Can I park at my accommodation?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: In the information about the accommodation you can find out if you can reserve a parking spot at the accommodation yourself. Approximately one week prior to departure you will receive the telephone number of your accommodation with your travel documents so that you can reserve a parking spot. At accommodations for which we do not state if reserving a parking spot is possible you can park in the public parking lot or, if present, in the public parking garage. Information about the public parking facilities on location can usually be found on the website of the destination in question.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Is the lift pass included in the holiday?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: Many of our package holidays include a six day lift pass. These are mentioned at the bottom of the price table as having the lift pass included in the total costs.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Why do I see two prices below?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
In the table below you can see the different prices for upgrading ski hire for a flights booking, as well as adding it for a self drive package. When there are two different prices, the upgrade prices for flights will always be listed first. If you are having problems viewing this, please contact our service team.

You can specify that you would like to include ski hire directly when booking.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Is there a children's discount on the holiday costs?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: Many hotels and some apartments and chalets have a children's discount and/or a discount for an extra bed in the room. You can easily find the discounts applicable to you. Select your party. The price that now appears in the price tables is the average price per person for your group size. If you move your mouse over the price table you will see the exact discounts valid per person. A third bed discount is not valid in combination with a children's discount. These two discounts cannot be given together. At many destinations there are also special children's discounts for lift passes. If the lift pass is included in the total costs then the discounts on the lift pass are also already calculated into this price table.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: How can I make a claim?
Can I book a room for 1 person?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: In most hotels we can offer single rooms. The price of the room is listed in the price overview of the accommodation. These rooms are often of a slightly lower quality. In principle, apartments cannot be booked for single travellers. There might be, however, special last minute offers shortly before departure that can be booked by single travellers.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Are towels and linen included with the apartment?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: With the apartments it is dependent on the accommodation whether or not the linen (bed linen and/or bath towels) is inclusive. You can find this clearly stated in the description. If sheets are not included you can often hire them on location (approx. £10 p.p.) or bring your own. In cases where apartments are stated to include the linen, you will usually receive one towel per person and the bed linen. Sometimes only the bed linen is included. It is advised to bring extra bath towels yourself because the bath towels will not be changed during the week. More information can be found under the header 'facilities' of the accommodation.  PLEASE NOTE: In France, it is normal to make your own bed, even if the linen is included in the holiday price.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: HOW CAN I CHANGE MY ADDRESS DETAILS?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: If you want to change your address details you can send an email to: info@sunweb.co.uk. It is important for you to fill in all the details correctly. In case the address in the booking has to be changed you need to state the booking number.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: CAN I ALSO PAY THE WHOLE AMOUNT ALL AT ONCE?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: This is not a problem. You can make the payment with the use of your own bank transfer, credit card or debit card. Please state your booking number clearly with your payment.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Travel documents
HOW DOES A BOOKING "ON REQUEST" WORK?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: If we do not have any rooms or apartments in stock ourselves it is sometimes possible to inquire with our accommodation provider if they might still have a room or apartment in their stock. We state this option on our website by highlighting the total costs in grey (= on request). How does it work? You book your holiday (online) and we will contact the accommodation provider. It usually takes a few days before we receive an answer. As soon as we receive an answer we will contact you. If a room or apartments becomes available then your booking can be confirmed. If there are no rooms or apartments available then we might be able to offer you an alternative accommodation.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: HOW DO I BOOK MULTIPLE ROOMS?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: If you want to book multiple rooms/apartments you need to click on the price of your chosen room type, and then simply click on the price of your next choice. This way it will appear together with your first option in one booking. If you are traveling with another family or a group of friends we advise you to make one booking in order to make sure that you are all assigned to the same flight. If you make two separate bookings we cannot ensure that you will be on the same flight.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Travel
ALL PARTICIPANTS WANT TO PAY SEPARATELY, IS THIS POSSIBLE?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: This is possible. The participants can transfer the money with the use of their own bank transfer or they can call us and do the payment with either credit card or debit card. However, they should state the booking number clearly so that our payment team knows which booking belongs to which payment.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: CAN I CHANGE OR ADD EXTRAS AFTER I  HAVE MADE THE BOOKING?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
Lift passes
Lift passes are usually collected by the reps at destination on the Wednesdays. If you would like to extend a lift pass or up grade a lift pass, please check the prices online. If you would like to make the change within 3 days of departure, you will have to call us so we can contact the rep/ guide at the destination to see if it is still possible to change the lift passes for either the extended or upgraded lift pass.

Ski lessons
It is possible to add ski lessons up to 4 days before departure. Ski lessons can only be booked for 6 day and from Saturday till Saturday.

Ski hire
Ski hire can be added to a booking up to 3 days in advance.

Insurance
It is possible to add insurance after the booking has been made.

NOTE: Only the lead booker can make changes to the booking. If you would like to change something in the booking, please email or phone us.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: What is a maisonette?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: A maisonette is an apartment consisting of two floors. The top floor only consists of a bedroom.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Is there a discount given for children on lift passes, lessons and equipment hire?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: At many destinations there are special children's discounts for lift passes, ski lessons and ski hire. You can find these children's discounts on our website via the accommodation, in the tab 'destinations' and then 'lift pass info'.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Do I have to pay a deposit?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
For hotel and pension rooms there is usually no deposit. Sometimes you are expected to pay a small deposit for the key.

Dealing with deposits is always between you and the accommodation provider. Sunweb has no influence on this and can therefore not be held accountable for conflicting opinions regarding the deposit between you and the accommodation provider.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Can I hire a helmet?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: You can hire a helmet for most destinations. You can find this in step 2 of the booking process. If you cannot book it through Sunweb, then you can either bring your own or rent one locally if available.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Am I entitled to restitution if I did not (fully) use my lift pass?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: If you have not been able to use your lift pass for one or more days, for whatever reason, then you need to contact the ski lift company on location yourself for any possible restitution. It is not possible to organise this after your holiday.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Are winter tires obligatory?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: There is no law in effect in the Alps that demands a vehicle to be equipped with winter tires. But if you break down on a snow covered road in an inappropriately equipped vehicle you can still be held responsible. In practice this means that the police can act in the event that the stranded vehicle poses a danger to other traffic or causes a traffic jam. The argument pertaining to a vehicle being 'inappropriately equipped' can also be used in determining the question of fault in the case of accidents. Therefore, travelling without winter tires is entirely the responsibility of the driver.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: When do I get my boarding pass?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: Approximately 10 days before your departure you will receive your Sunweb Travel documents. In these documents there will be instructions on how to check-in through the EasyJet website and print off your boarding passes.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: The discount `No lift pass` is not stated on the intermediate price overview, how can this be?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: In order to have this discount appear properly in the intermediate price overview you need to fill in the date of birth of the participant who does not want to use the lift pass in step 1.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Is wearing a helmet obligatory?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: In most ski areas wearing a helmet is not (yet) obligatory. We advise you however to hire a helmet for your child(ren) on location or through Sunweb.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: What are the costs for taking a baby?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
Self drive holidays: For babies between the age of 0-1 (age on the day of departure) there are sometimes small costs or reservation fees applied. For This will be calculated automatically and displayed in step 2 of the booking process.

 

Flight package: For babies 0-1 (age on the day of departure) small accommodation costs may be applied to your booking. These will be calculated automatically and displayed in step 2 of the booking process.

 

An infant is anyone younger than 2 years old;

 

Babies can travel provided that they are at least 12 days old. Infants under two weeks of age can not fly.

 

Babies and infants under 2 are not charged a full fare. A flat rate of £22 per flight will be charged by Easy Jet if they travel on the lap of an accompanying adult. Babies and infants travelling on a adults lap also need their own boarding pass which is available to be collected from the airport check in desk.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Do I have to pay a deposit for the apartment?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: For studios and apartments there is usually a deposit required. You will get this back when you depart as long as the state of your accommodation is approved. In some cases the deposit will be sent to your home afterwards through the post. The deposit sum and the payment details are always listed in the details of the accommodation in question. Dealing with deposits is always between you and the accommodation provider. Sunweb has no influence on this and can therefore not be held accountable for conflicting opinions regarding the deposit between you and the accommodation provider.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: I LIVE ABROAD. WHICH BANK DETAILS DO I NEED IN ORDER TO MAKE A PAYMENT?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText:
You can use the following details if you want to make a payment to us from abroad:

Bank: Lloyds TSB
Account number: 21109768
Bank Sort Code: 306541
BIC/SWIFT code: LLOYDGB21682
IBAN code: GB09 LOYD 3065 4121 1097 68

OR

You can call us to make the payment with credit card or debit card.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: CAN I BOOK A HOLIDAY WITHOUT A LIFT PASS?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: If you want to book one of our accommodations a lift pass is usually included in the price. You can find this information at the bottom of the price overview of the accommodation. If you do not want to book a lift pass, then you can state this during step 2 of your booking. In step 3 of your booking the discount will be calculated into the price.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: IS IT POSSIBLE TO RESERVE TWO ROOMS NEXT TO EACH OTHER?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: If you are going on holiday together with family or a group of friends we advise you to make one booking. You will then make the most chance of being put together. Please take into account that we cannot guarantee this. We are dependent on the accommodation provider and can only deal with this as a preference.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Where can I pick up the ski equipment?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: We work with different equipment providers per destination. You will find the address details of the relevant provider stated on the travel document that you will receive at the latest one week prior to departure.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Can I book a holiday without a lift pass?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: If you want to book one of our accommodations a lift pass is usually included in the price. Information about this can be found at the bottom of the price overview of the accommodation. If you do not want to book a lift pass you can mention this at step 2 of your booking. Here you click 'No lift pass'. At step 3 of your booking the discount will be calculated.

KnowledgeBases.DisplayText: Do I need a passport sized photo for the lift pass?
KnowledgeBases.SolutionText: At a small number of ski areas a passport sized photo is still obligatory. If you need a passport sized photo you can find relevant information on our website: at the accommodation in question, under the header " Lift Pass/ Skis & classes" and "Lift Pass". You can also find this information stated on the vouchers. Please note: There are a number of ski areas where people exempt from discounts (e.g. adults) do not need a photo, while persons who are entitled to a discount do need a photo. In this case it is then necessary to attach a photo to children's and senior lift passes. This information is also stated on our website and on the vouchers.
